00001 /* The following code example is taken from the book
00002  * "C++ Templates - The Complete Guide"
00003  * by David Vandevoorde and Nicolai M. Josuttis, Addison-Wesley, 2002
00004  *
00005  * (C) Copyright David Vandevoorde and Nicolai M. Josuttis 2002.
00006  * Permission to copy, use, modify, sell and distribute this software
00007  * is granted provided this copyright notice appears in all copies.
00008  * This software is provided "as is" without express or implied
00009  * warranty, and with no claim as to its suitability for any purpose.
00010  */
00011 #ifndef TYPEOP_HPP
00012 #define TYPEOP_HPP
00013 
00014 namespace cupp {
00015 namespace kernel_magic {
00016 
00017 // primary template
00018 /**********************************
00019  * typeop1.hpp:
00020  **********************************/
00021 template <typename T>
00022 class TypeOp {            // primary template
00023   public:
00024     typedef T         ArgT;
00025     typedef T         BareT;
00026     typedef T const   ConstT;
00027     typedef T &       RefT;
00028     typedef T &       RefBareT;
00029     typedef T const & RefConstT;
00030 };
00031 /**** end of typeop1.hpp ****/
00032 
00033 // partial specialization for const
00034 /**********************************
00035  * typeop2.hpp:
00036  **********************************/
00037 template <typename T>
00038 class TypeOp <T const> {  // partial specialization for const types
00039   public:
00040     typedef T const   ArgT;
00041     typedef T         BareT;
00042     typedef T const   ConstT;
00043     typedef T const & RefT;
00044     typedef T &       RefBareT;
00045     typedef T const & RefConstT;
00046 };
00047 /**** end of typeop2.hpp ****/
00048 
00049 // partial specialization for references
00050 /**********************************
00051  * typeop3.hpp:
00052  **********************************/
00053 template <typename T>
00054 class TypeOp <T&> {       // partial specialization for references
00055   public:
00056     typedef T &                         ArgT;
00057     typedef typename TypeOp<T>::BareT   BareT;
00058     typedef T const                     ConstT;
00059     typedef T &                         RefT;
00060     typedef typename TypeOp<T>::BareT & RefBareT;
00061     typedef T const &                   RefConstT;
00062 };
00063 /**** end of typeop3.hpp ****/
00064 
00065 // full specialization for void
00066 /**********************************
00067  * typeop4.hpp:
00068  **********************************/
00069 template<>
00070 class TypeOp <void> {     // full specialization for void
00071   public:
00072     typedef void       ArgT;
00073     typedef void       BareT;
00074     typedef void const ConstT;
00075     typedef void       RefT;
00076     typedef void       RefBareT;
00077     typedef void       RefConstT;
00078 };
00079 /**** end of typeop4.hpp ****/
00080 
00081 }
00082 }
00083 
00084 #endif // TYPEOP_HPP
